Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
Review: A powerful story of hope and friendship.

Title: The Godfather
Overview: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
Review: A masterclass in storytelling and character development.

Title: The Dark Knight
Overview: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.
Review: A thrilling and dark take on the superhero genre.

Title: Schindler's List
Overview: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution.
Review: A haunting portrayal of the Holocaust.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
Review: A groundbreaking film with unforgettable dialogue.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Overview: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to save Middle-earth.
Review: An epic conclusion to a legendary trilogy.

Title: Fight Club
Overview: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
Review: A thought-provoking exploration of consumerism and identity.

Title: Forrest Gump
Overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with a low IQ.
Review: A heartwarming tale of love and destiny.

Title: Inception
Overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
Review: A mind-bending thriller that challenges reality.

Title: The Matrix
Overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
Review: A revolutionary film that redefined sci-fi.

Title: Goodfellas
Overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.
Review: A gripping portrayal of life in organized crime.

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Overview: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative killer to catch another serial killer.
Review: A chilling psychological thriller with unforgettable performances.

Title: City of God
Overview: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a drug dealer.
Review: A raw and powerful depiction of life in the favelas.

Title: Se7en
Overview: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.
Review: A dark and gripping thriller that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

Title: The Usual Suspects
Overview: A sole survivor tells a tale of a heist gone wrong and the mysterious Keyser SÃ¶ze.
Review: A masterfully crafted crime thriller with a legendary twist.

Title: The Lion King
Overview: Lion prince Simba flees his kingdom after the death of his father, but returns as an adult to reclaim his throne.
Review: A timeless classic with stunning animation and music.

Title: The Departed
Overview: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.
Review: A tense and thrilling crime drama with stellar performances.

Title: Gladiator
Overview: A former Roman general sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
Review: An epic tale of revenge and honor.
